about_the_game:
(Link to the Discord can be found on the right panel) =>





Battle against fearsome raid bosses alone! Uncover your past in Aritas, a sinister world ravaged by ancient Gods of the Realm Below. This ARPG features 9 class specializations, hundreds of unique items, a vast array of skills, complex character progression, and intense Raidboss encounters.







  • 9 Unique Class Specializations
    Begin your journey as one of three unique classes, each offering a distinct playstyle. As you progress you will unlock advanced specializations that broaden your abilities and strategic options to refine your build.
  • 110+ Legendary and Heirloom Items
    Arm yourself with a wealth of magical items, perfecting them through crafting. Alter your strategies with potent legendary and heirloom items that redefine your build. Stay driven by our deep and randomized loot system, always hunting for the next big upgrade.
  • Countless Unique Skills and Affinities
    Discover a variety of unique skills, each offering diverse affinities to modify, empower, or completely transform your playstyle. Turn your Crimson Slash into a ravaging blood vortex, transform your ground slam into a volcanic eruption that incinerates foes, or summon illusionary copies of Kitra to spread poison among your enemies!
  • Find your Destiny
    Find hidden graves of fallen heroes across the world to inherit their powers and forge your own destiny. With over 200 Destiny Nodes, you can customize a combination that perfectly matches your playstyle!
  • Powerful Relics and Soul Crystals
    Harness the power of ancient relics to embed powerful Soul Crystals containing the essence of defeated bosses and enemies. Amplify your playstyle by utilizing these crystals, turning your foes' own strengths against them!

  • Fast and Fluid Third-Person Combat
    Use the new camera perspective to mow down hordes of enemies in fast-paced close combat. Experience satisfying high-impact visual and sound effects that amplify the weight of your actions, all while maintaining full control with fluid movement and smooth camera controls.
  • Quest Through Aritas
    Explore the mysteries of Aritas and uncover the means to halt the spreading corruption of the Ones Below! Aid villagers in need, unravel your own past, and challenge epic bosses in over 30 quests and sidequests. Anticipation awaits at every corner!
  • Challenge the Gods
    Face off against the most powerful monsters in epic Raidboss-Battles. Showcase your build mastery in the ultimate challenge, testing both its capabilities and your quick decision-making skills.
  • Endlessly Replayable Raid-Style Endgame
    Progress through an endless journey of Endgame Dungeons to refine your build and confront the Avatars in their Pure Form. Only the strongest, most resilient builds will prevail to claim their Pure Items. The sky's the limit for how far you can push your own potential!

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10, 11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD Processor, 2.5 Ghz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD Series Card or Higher
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specifications are not final and are subject to change.
